title: 151 - The Rise Of The Sludge Babies
description: On today's show, the boys chat about their weekends and what everyone did as well as chat about the new Zach Snyder Netflix movie Army of the Dead may or may not have stunk, they build their ideal video game portfolio, chat about the Willy Wonka origin story and some of their other favorite origin stories, Gumpy continues to defend Big Sky (which may or may not have been cancelled), they debate the efficacy of growing babies in pods and feeding them with what looks to be similar to the ooze in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2, and chat about everything else as they sort through a loaded Pod FOD. Don't forget to subscribe to The Pod Youtube channel to watch clips and full episodes of the show, and send your submissions to the Folder to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you on Friday.
